body.name: Portable Mini Fully Automatic Washing Machine for Underwear, Panties, and Socks Designed Specifically for Separating Close-Fitting Clothing (ABS-WHITE-GRAY)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 7 hrs 47 mins
features: Special Notes:Undergoes strict testing before leaving the factory. The presence of water marks inside the machine is a typical phenomenon, as it is a completely new and unused washing machine.

Attention Please:This is a mini portable washing machine designed for small items that need to be washed separately, such as underwear, socks, baby clothes, etc. Its rated washing capacity is only 0.7kg (1.55LB), and it cannot clean large items such as sweaters and jeans.

Fully automatic: Despite its small size, this washing machine is different from other portable washing machines in that it is fully automatic. Once the water inlet pipe is connected to the faucet, it can automatically fill with water, drain, and even perform a rinse cycle and automatic spin (650 rpm) in standard mode.

Safe:This washing machine is designed with two lids for added safety. If either lid is opened while the machine is running, it will automatically pause and emit a warning sound, making it a safer option.

Program Specification:Four modes are available on this washing machine: Standard mode, which takes around 45 minutes and is gentle yet thorough; Quick mode, which takes around 35 minutes and is ideal for lightly soiled small items; Self-cleaning mode, which takes around 15 minutes and cleans the washing machine drum; and Spin mode, which takes around 8 minutes and is great for quickly drying small items.

Warranty Period :The warranty period for the product is one year, starting from the date of product receipt. If you encounter any quality issues or missing accessories, please contact us immediately and we will provide you with satisfactory after-sales service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: All-In-One Automatic Mini Washing Machine With Wash, Rinse, And Spin Functions.There is no need to wash intimate clothes by hand.

When the washing machine detects the highest water level of the water flow, it will automatically stop the water flow to avoid overflow. The motor uses special gears to reduce power loss and operate more efficiently
Prevent From Moving Double Lid Enhances Safety 650 RPM High-Speed Spin-Drying
This washing machine is designed with two lids for added safety. If either lid is opened while the machine is running, it will automatically pause and emit a warning sound, making it a safer option.
If the outer cover is opened during operation, the machine will immediatelystop running and sound an alarm, ensuring greater safety for this product.

Program Specification:Four modes are available on this washing machine: Normal mode, which takes around 45 minutes and is gentle yet thorough; Quick Washing mode, which takes around 35 minutes and is ideal for lightly soiled small items; Self Clean mode, which takes around 15 minutes and cleans the washing machine drum; Spin only mode, which takes around 8 minutes and is great for quickly drying small items.
Rated capacity: 7L Rated washing/spin-drying capacity: 0.7KG(1.54LB) Adapter output: 12VDC 3A Rated washing power: 36W Product net weight: 13.78LB, product gross weight: 15.52LB.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought one before to wash my baby's clothes; this new model is much easier to use than the old model; it is fully automatic and does not need to change the water, which is really convenient. It is also convenient to wash your own underwear; it has a self-cleaning function, which is really practical and the price is very affordable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Machine.
reviews.reviewText: Quick easy set up although you might need an after market adapter for your faucet connection depending on your homes particular plumbing set up. I use this machine to wash my compression socks with no problem. Don't expect to do your home laundry in this machine. It's made for small loads. It may take a few loads for you to get the correct small amount of laundry detergent to use for a load.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Things I wish I knew before buying
reviews.reviewText: The drain hose has no pump, the drain where the dirty water is going into has to be below the unit.The unit does not stop after each cycle, you have to babysit the unit until the cycle is done and manually turn it off or it will be running a load over and over.Must be installed on a surface where the suction cups can properly work or the machine will bounce around when on the spin cycle.I’ve gone through the whole process of installation and threw all packing stuff away if not because of this I would had returned the unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fancy and convenient small washing machine!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Can’t wait to review this brand new machine from a small business.This fully automatic washing machine looks so fancy! Good looking table washing machine!And it is very convenient for small things, like underwear, socks, even T-shirts all over with sweat.No need to go to the washroom to pay for washing. Save water and save energy for using a large washing machine.I think it is much more useful for washing infant clothes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It just rinses and spins, no deep cleaning.
reviews.reviewText: I think this is clever, and it's certainly easy to use. You'll need to figure out how to hook it up depending on your situation. It's easy to plug into the garden hose if you have a porch or balcony.The plumbing hookup is all plastic and makes me a little nervous. I really wouldn't want this thing to spring a leak while I was at work or on vacation. If installing this in the kitchen or bathroom, I strongly advise adding a shutoff valve.It really doesn't get your clothes very clean. This is the equivalent of giving your items a few rinses in the sink.It's just a soak and a gentle spin. It does not agitate. It does not remove lint, debris, hair, etc. And this is cold water only.It will absolutely not handle anything soiled or stained. I wouldn't recommend doing whites in here.It won't handle anything too sweaty. It won't handle gym socks. It won't handle a stained or soiled onesie.It's got a very small capacity. Even an XL t-shirt is too big for it. It's really for socks, underwear, hand towels, baby items, etc.It's also got a pretty bad design decision - they put the electrical plug right in between the two water lines. This would never pass any sort of US safety standards.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for face towels!
reviews.reviewText: I have really sensitive & picky skin, to the point where I do my laundry with different detergents and in different cycles based on where the fabric is going to touch me. I always have difficulty with breaking out if I use a face towel I wash with my normal body towel, and I hate disposable cotton rounds. This is perfect for doing a little load of reusable cotton rounds or microfiber cloths. It actually gets them clean, even when I've taken off makeup with them, and lets me do just a teenie load so that I don't have to scrounge up enough laundry to make it worth going to a laundromat.The capacity is on the smaller side, but I'd recommend this for anyone living alone or just in need of washing small things like baby clothes separate from the rest of their laundry.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Camping Washer
reviews.reviewText: I got this washer to use while camping when I need to throw in a very small dirty load. This washer works great for that purpose, but I wouldn’t recommend it as a main washer for anyone to use on the regular. It works great for a very specific usage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars washes pretty well
reviews.reviewText: I think this is a fair price for a decent little washer. I wouldn't expect it to do amazing cleaning the dirtiest outfits, but used and smelly clothes does come out smelling and looking good. We like to camp and use our RV, so this will come in handy soon.
